journey.title: Early Years
journey.description: Growing up in Sweden, I discovered my fascination with technology and computers at a young age. My curiosity combined with my love for video games led me to explore the digital world.

journey.title: Teenage Years
journey.description: As a teenager, I began exploring programming and coding, realizing that I could create my own digital experiences. This sparked my passion for software development.

journey.title: Fiber Technician
journey.description: Specialized in fiber network stability and provided technical support directly to customers. Gained hands-on experience in infrastructure.

journey.title: Graduate Engineer (TE4)
journey.description: Specializing in Software Design, Agile methodologies (Scrum), and scalable architecture. Focused on building meaningful digital solutions.
